In a recent blog post entitled "the foaf+ssl paradigm shift" I show  
how the foaf+ssl protocol helps create RESTful web identity for  
distributed open yet secure social networks

http://blogs.sun.com/bblfish/entry/the_foaf_ssl_paradigm_shift

I hope this helps explain what this is all about in a fun way.

Henry

Blog: http://blogs.sun.com/bblfish
